mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_num, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.pro_img, p.pro_uploadpath, c.cart_amount, p.pro_price * c.cart_amount as orderprice FROM cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p ON c.pro_num = p.pro_num AND c.mb_id = #{mb_id}
